articles.title: New function for nuki smart hosting
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Nuki is launching a new range of connected locks compatible with Matter and Thread. Current Nuki products will not support this new home automation standard. The Nuki Smart Lock 3.0 Pro White was available during Prime Day 2023.

articles.title: Are 'solo operators' the next generation of Australia's traditional sole traders?
articles.summary: Honcho launched its Instant Website Generator, an AI-powered tool that creates customized websites in under 60 seconds by only requiring business name, industry, and location. The layouts are responsive across all devices, and it includes domain registration and email setup, costing $49/year for domain registration, $299/year for email, and offering a 30-day free trial for the website builder.

articles.title: Anthropic Introduces App Creation Directly within Claude AI Chatbot
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Anthropic is introducing a new feature to its Claude AI chatbot that enables users to create AI-driven apps directly within the application.  Users can describe their intended creation, and Claude will generate the corresponding code. These applications will be able to communicate with Claude through an API.

articles.title: Theta Labs Launches Hybrid Edge Cloud Architecture with Dynamic Supply-Demand GPU marketplace to Democratize Access to Computing
articles.author: Chainwire
articles.summary: Theta Labs announced the beta release of its hybrid edge cloud architecture for its Theta EdgeCloud network. This platform combines cloud-based GPUs with a distributed network of community-operated edge nodes to provide cost-effective access to high-performance computing resources for AI model training and inference, video processing, and financial modelling. The platform includes a decentralized GPU marketplace to keep compute pricing competitive.

articles.title: 5 Overlooked ChatGPT Features To Make More Money Online
articles.author: Rachel Wells
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT offers several features for freelancers to launch new services and products. These include building niche-specific ChatGPT versions, conducting market research with the 'deep research' tool, and using prompt chaining to develop complex strategies. Leveraging these features can accelerate time to market and help freelancers maximize their skills for new product or service development.

articles.title: Review: Dangbei N2 Mini projector brings AI setup and HD for under £200
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Dangbei launched the N2 Mini, a smart, compact projector with HD visuals, AI auto setup, and built-in streaming apps. It features InstanPro AI Image Setup technology, including Auto Focus, Auto Keystone Correction, and Obstacle Avoidance and is available on Amazon with a discount.

articles.title: Clean up on Amazon with over $100 off this Dyson Vacuum ahead of Prime Day
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: The Dyson V8 Plus Cordless Vacuum is available for over $100 off ahead of Amazon's Prime Day sale. It features up to 40 minutes of runtime, specialized tools for pet hair, HEPA filtration, and converts to a handheld vacuum. The Dyson V8 is called the best vacuum by the industry-leading brand.

articles.title: Nu Skin Expands and Repackages ageLOC® Tru Face® Line, Setting a New Standard for Sustainable Skincare
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nu Skin Enterprises Inc. relaunched its ageLOC® Tru Face® line, incorporating high-performance skincare with planet-friendly innovation. The refreshed line features upgraded and more sustainable packaging designed to reduce environmental impact, lower carbon emissions and embrace a refillable system.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Secures Orders of Over 700K Compostable Pods in May  Jun. 25, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: NEXE Innovations received purchase orders totaling over 700,000 compostable coffee pods. They are expanding flavored coffee offerings through a partnership with Crazy Cups, covering 20 SKUs. NEXE is also developing 20 new SKUs across its customer base for launch, including 14 for Crazy Cups, and fulfilled repeat orders from Bridgehead Coffee and a North American office coffee services partner.

articles.title: I've found my perfect everyday shaver – and it's barely bigger than a matchbox
articles.author: Head
articles.summary: The Yoose Mini Shaver, a USB-C rechargeable shaver, is introduced as a compact and effective grooming tool. Priced at approximately £59.99 (discounted from £79.99 on Amazon), the shaver features a double-ring curved mesh head, a powerful 8000 rpm motor, and IPX7 waterproof design, offering up to 30 days of use per charge.

articles.title: Electroluminescent Paint, Headlight Speakers May Be the Future of Cars
articles.author: Newsweek
articles.summary: Mercedes-AMG debuted new-age technologies on the Concept AMG GT XX car this week. This introduction showcases new features and potentially a new product from the company.

articles.title: PS Plus games for July includes one of the best dungeon crawlers ever
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Sony announced the new PlayStation Plus service.

articles.title: Why Google Bought a $100 Million Stake in Gentle Monster
articles.summary: Google invested $100 million in Gentle Monster to develop smart glasses, signifying Google's renewed push into smart glasses using AR/AI and Gentle Monster's designs. While an official launch of Google and Gentle Monster collaboration has not been confirmed, the collaboration aims to merge tech with fashion.

articles.title: Veed: Video creation tool
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: Veed introduces an AI-powered video creation tool designed for business professionals. Key features include Auto Subtitles, a Brand Kit, Dubbing, Text to Video AI, AI Clips, AI Avatars, and a Recorder to facilitate the creation of engaging video content.

articles.title: Glasp: Web and PDF summarizer and highlighter
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: Glasp offers a versatile business tool service that allows users to highlight and organize insightful ideas from webpages, PDFs, and YouTube videos. Glasp enhances knowledge-sharing and learning with features like personalized AI clone building, Kindle highlight importing, and organized notes using tags and authors.

articles.title: AdFetch: AI-powered ad creation tool
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: AdFetch introduces its innovative business tool, powered by advanced AI technology, that enables users to create high-converting ads quickly. The tool features an instant ad generator for creating static ads and supports various ad formats optimized for social media and display ads. A comprehensive analytics dashboard is planned for future release.

articles.title: There's a desktop-grade Nvidia RTX 5050 after all, and it's out next month
articles.author: Rock
articles.summary: Nvidia launched the GeForce RTX 5050 laptop GPU. The launch was quiet but also included the announcement of a desktop version.

articles.title: How ChatGPT finds real discount codes
articles.author: Tarek Salame
articles.summary: ChatGPT has launched a new service that allows users to search for online discount codes. By enabling browser capabilities, users can prompt ChatGPT to find active discounts from multiple retailers for specific stores, products, or time periods, potentially saving time and money. The service returns a list of valid discount codes with expiry dates and savings, although users need to verify the codes.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE DEAL — Save up to 76%, get a free Amazon voucher and a bonus ...
articles.author: Space
articles.summary: NordVPN is offering up to 76% off subscriptions, a free Amazon voucher, and a bonus four months free. This offer is available ahead of Amazon Prime Day.

articles.title: Best AI Sexting Apps and Chatbots of 2025
articles.author: Longmont Leader Staff
articles.summary: The article introduces several new AI sexting apps designed to provide users with a variety of experiences, from explicit text-based fantasies with Infatuated AI to realistic conversations with Candy.ai. DreamGF offers visual roleplay with AI-generated images, while Privee AI focuses on personalized kinks and Muah AI provides a diverse selection of bot characters. These platforms offer diverse options for users seeking uncensored adult content and AI companionship.

articles.title: Woman Shows Off Advanced Tech in Omoda Car, Impresses Mzansi
articles.author: Gloria Masia
articles.summary: Omoda's new cars, equipped with advanced voice command features, are gaining popularity in South Africa, particularly among young professionals. A viral TikTok video demonstrates the car's voice command system, a new feature on Omoda's latest models, generating interest in the brand and its modern, affordable luxury offerings. The video showcases the car's modern functions, creating a buzz around the company's sleek design and innovative technology.

articles.title: Ruko Announces Prime Day Deal on U11MINI 4K Drone – The Lightweight Powerhouse for Summer Adventures
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: Ruko is launching a July Promotional Event for its U11MINI 4K Drone, an ultra-light drone perfect for beginners and outdoor enthusiasts. The promotional event includes special discounts on the drone through Ruko's Amazon store from July 8 to July 11, offering both single-battery and three-battery versions at discounted prices.

articles.title: KSDL plans to expand reach of products like Mysore Sandal Soap, shower gels into European markets
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL) intends to broaden the availability of their products, including Mysore Sandal Soap and shower gels, into European markets. The company is exploring cooperation with the UK to support this expansion.

articles.title: Everything You Need to Make the Most of Your Summer Rental
articles.author: Nora Bean
articles.summary: Shipt offers same-day delivery of affordable items from Target, CVS, Lidl, Lowe's, and other local partners. This service allows customers to quickly obtain essentials and extras for summer rentals, ensuring a more enjoyable and convenient vacation experience.

articles.title: Aldi hosts ‘soft opening' in New Dorp: Here's how to get a golden ticket for the official launch
articles.author: Jessica Jones-Gorman
articles.summary: Aldi has launched its second store on Staten Island, with a soft opening preceding the grand opening on June 26th. The store offers Aldi-exclusive brands, organic meats, fresh produce, and sustainable seafood, aiming to provide affordable groceries. To celebrate, Aldi is offering gift cards and a sweepstakes for customers during the opening.

articles.title: OnePlus expands doorstep service to 19,000-plus pincodes in India
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OnePlus has expanded its doorstep pickup and drop service for after-sales support to over 19,000 pincodes in India as part of Project Starlight, a program with a Rs 6,000 crore investment. OnePlus is also hosting a nationwide Service Camp from June 20 to June 30, 2025, providing free device check-ups and software updates.

articles.title: Edimakor V4.0.1 Revolutionizes Digital Creation with Powerful AI Image and Video Generation Tools
articles.author: Hitpaw Edimakor
articles.summary: HitPaw's Edimakor released Edimakor V4.0.1, which introduces creation of powerful AI-generated image and video. Edimakor V4.0.1 includes features like Text-to-Image, Reference-Based Image Generation, Image Stylization, and AI Video Generator, offering a unified system for video creation. The release aims to empower creators worldwide with smarter, faster, and more intuitive digital creation tools.

articles.title: No7 has dropped a half-price alternative to Laneige's sleeping mask – but which is best?
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: No7 launched its good intent bouncy jelly mask, promising to soften, moisturize, and give a dewy finish. This new product is being compared to Laneige's bouncy and firm mask, which was launched in March 2024. The reviewer compared the consistency of the masks on her skin, scents, textures, and the state of her skin afterwards.

articles.title: This Device Is 'Life-Changing' For Hot Sleepers
articles.author: Tessa Flores
articles.summary: BedJet introduced a fan unit that blows air under the covers to regulate sleep temperature, with features like 'biorhythm sleep technology' for personalized settings and a heating mode for year-round use. The basic model conditions the whole bed, while the Dual Zone model allows independent control, and it can be controlled via a smart app or remote; it is available on Amazon starting at $549.

articles.title: Lost IKEA Catalog Pages for Furniture That Rearranges Itself at Night
articles.author: Branded Content
articles.summary: Dreamina introduces AI-powered image generator, AI logo creator, and sticker designer to aid in creating catalogs for innovative furniture. The AI Image generator helps to prepare rich text prompt for building furniture images of self-arranging furniture to create a catalog shot for auto-sorted bookshelf or a dramatic sofa. These tools enable users to visualize eco-friendly designs and generate realistic images for furniture catalogs, enhancing storytelling and engagement with potential customers.

articles.title: Valley Junction Pride taking place this Sunday
articles.summary: WeAreIowa requires the WeAreIowa app for streaming content on phones. This implies the introduction of a new or updated 'WeAreIowa' app service.

articles.title: M&S shoppers say 'I'll pass' after new £2.80 sandwich revealed
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) has launched a new limited-edition "Red Diamond Strawberry & Creme Sandwich," inspired by Japanese sweet sandos. The sandwich, priced at £2.80, features ripe strawberries and whipped cream cheese between sweetened bread and is available in M&S food halls.

articles.title: Boost your energy with up to 40% off plant-based protein lattes that taste amazing: 'My energy and mental clarity are through the roof!'
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: Laird Superfood introduced Instant Lattes, plant-based beverages packed with vital nutrients. These instant beverages are available in varieties such as mocha, matcha, vanilla, and chai. Customers can get discounts on one-time orders or subscriptions using a specific code.

articles.title: T&C Tried & True: A Rechargeable Wet Mop Leaves Floors Sparkling Clean
articles.author: Norman Vanamee
articles.summary: Dyson introduced the WashG1, a rechargeable wet floor cleaner, designed to replace traditional buckets and mops. The WashG1 features counter-rotating rollers for scrubbing and debris collection, a water control display, and a self-cleaning function. It is easy to use and leaves floors sparkling clean.

articles.title: Mack Trucks Introduces the All-New Mack Anthem®: The New Standard in Regional Haul
articles.author: Mack Trucks
articles.summary: A next-generation truck features enhanced maneuverability and a 10% fuel efficiency improvement. The truck also offers industry-leading comfort, specifically for regional operations.

articles.title: Truelogic rolls out AI search optimization service
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: Truelogic, Inc. has launched a search optimization service to enhance brand visibility in AI-powered searches. The new service helps brands adjust to AI search era through AI visibility checks, content upgrades, speed boosts, and authority building. According to Truelogic, brands need to be fast, helpful, and trustworthy to succeed in AI-generated search results.

articles.title: POCO launches ‘flagship-level' F7 smartphone
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: POCO launched the POCO F7 smartphone in the Philippines, featuring a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 mobile platform, advanced cooling system, and a 6,500mAh battery with 90W HyperCharge. The POCO F7 includes a 50MP Sony IMX882 main camera with optical image stabilization and is available in 12GB+256GB and 12GB+512GB variants via POCO's Shopee store.

articles.title: Why Gen Z aren't the booze buzzkills we've been led to believe
articles.summary: Diageo has revamped Smirnoff Ice with a new look and can format to cater to Gen Z drinkers, maintaining its original citrus flavor. BuzzBallz, known for its unique packaging, has risen to become a popular RTD brand.

articles.title: Upwave Wins 'Generative AI Innovation Award' at 8th Annual AI Breakthrough Awards
articles.author: Upwave
articles.summary: Upwave received the 'Generative AI Innovation Award' for its AI Agent, Bayes. The company's AI Campaign Insights Reports, powered by Bayes, represent a practical application of generative AI in advertising measurement and were launched in Q1 2024.

articles.title: Papa Johns to open new store and the first 100 customers will get a free pizza
articles.author: Robert Dalling
articles.summary: Papa Johns is opening a new store in Newport and giving away free personal pizzas to the first 100 customers. The new location will create up to 15 new jobs and offer collection and delivery options. Customers can also purchase a medium pizza with two toppings for £7.99 or a large for £9.99 for collection only.

articles.title: Samsung Opens Pre-Reservations in India for Next-Gen Galaxy Devices Ahead of July 9 Launch
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the pre-reservation window for its next-generation Galaxy devices in India, launching globally on July 9. The new lineup includes an AI-powered interface and advanced hardware. Pre-reservations are available across multiple platforms, offering exclusive benefits.

articles.title: Best Mart 360 Debuts on foodpanda mall in Hong Kong
articles.summary: Best Mart 360 and FoodVille have launched their products on foodpanda mall, offering over 500 premium global products. Customers can now order popular snacks, exclusive flagship brands, international wines, and premium cooking oils, with delivery available in as little as 30 minutes through foodpanda couriers from selected stores. This collaboration allows Best Mart 360 and FoodVille to expand their online platform and provide a convenient shopping experience to customers.

articles.title: Doctors Implants
articles.summary: KENS 5 provides a streaming service via the KENS 5 app for mobile phone users. The app allows users to stream KENS 5 content.

articles.title: Elkhart inventor, local manufacturer team up to launch Smart Drain Pro
articles.summary: An Elkhart inventor and a local manufacturer have collaborated to launch a new product called 'Smart Drain Pro'. The 'Smart Drain Pro' is available for purchase at Menards and online for around $55.99.

articles.title: Popular Brunch Spot Plans To Open New London Restaurant
articles.author: Chris Rhatigan
articles.summary: Water Street Waffle Company, a restaurant specializing in brunch and Liege waffles, is opening a new location in downtown New London at 133 Bank St. The new restaurant will offer a menu including specialty waffles, loaded French toast, cocktails, and appetizers.

articles.title: How to Get a Free Bottle of Heinz's Newest Mustard
articles.author: Matt Wadleigh
articles.summary: Kraft Heinz is launching HEINZ MUSTAAAAAARD, a smoky and sweet chipotle honey mustard. The product will be available at Walmart.com, Target, 7-Eleven, and Amazon in mid-July, with customers able to get a free bottle at Buffalo Wild Wings with the purchase of beef menu items starting June 25.

articles.title: Shokz OpenDots One review: Open-ear headphones for active lifestyles
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Shokz recently debuted the OpenDots ONE earbuds. OpenDots ONE is the brand's first foray into ear-clip products. Brands like Bose, Huawei and Monster have helped expand the growing tech category.

articles.title: Motorola Pad 60 Pro review: Feature-rich mid-range tablet
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Motorola's Pad 60 Pro offers a balance of features suitable for entertainment and creative artwork. The device includes a free Moto Pen Pro stylus, enhancing its appeal.

articles.title: Is Daydream's AI Platform the Answer to Fashion's Discovery Problem?
articles.author: Hilary Milnes
articles.summary: Daydream is launching a beta version of its AI-powered shopping platform at Daydream.ing. The platform utilizes a chat-based interface and generative AI to provide product recommendations from 8,500 brands and over two million products. Users create a 'style passport' to personalize their shopping experience, with launch partners including Net-a-Porter and Alo Yoga.

articles.title: Verizon Just Made Customer Service Smarter With AI and 24/7 Support
articles.author: Jon Fisher
articles.summary: Verizon has launched a new AI-powered customer service system utilizing Google Cloud's Gemini models. The launch includes 24/7 live chat and a redesigned My Verizon app featuring an AI assistant for tasks like billing and account management. The new system aims to provide more personalized assistance and simplify customer support.

articles.title: 3 Multilingual AI Tools for Reaching Global Ecommerce Audiences
articles.author: Deanna Ritchie
articles.summary: HeyGen, Synthesia, and Elai offer multilingual AI tools for video creation and localization. HeyGen provides AI avatars for localized presentations, Synthesia supports over 120 languages for professional-grade videos, and Elai offers flexible content testing and quick updates in multiple markets. These tools facilitate global e-commerce expansion by enabling businesses to create and adapt marketing and educational content in various languages.

articles.title: New Look £27 linen trousers are 'stylish' and 'flattering' and fans say 'really comfortable'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: New Look is selling the Black Linen Blend Drawstring Waist Trousers for £26.99, crafted in a linen blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, relaxed wide legs, a mid rise waist, and side slit pockets.  The trousers are available in black, white, khaki green, navy and bright red, with sizes including 10, 12, 16 and 18.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans rushing to buy new school uniforms for new term with prices from 99c
articles.author: Emma Kilcawley Hemani
articles.summary: Aldi is launching its new school uniform range with items priced from 99 cents, including polo shirts, skirts, and trousers. Additionally, Aldi introduced the Lacura Facial Tanning Mist priced at €3.99, available in Day Glimmer or Night Shine.

articles.title: 'Cute' Instax camera that adds 'vintage charm' to your pics now just £70
articles.author: Ambarish Awale
articles.summary: Fujifilm offers the Instax Mini 12, a compact instant camera priced at £69.99 on Amazon. The camera features automatic exposure, flash control, a selfie mirror, and a five-second print speed, designed for simplicity and capturing nostalgic photos. It is available in five colors: Mint Green, Blossom Pink, Clay White, Lilac Purple, or Pastel Blue.

articles.title: E-commerce powerhouse Julie Bornstein unveils Daydream—an AI-powered fashion shopping agent that's 25 years in the making
articles.summary: Daydream, an AI-powered fashion discovery and shopping marketplace, is launching in beta. The platform uses AI to provide personalized fashion recommendations based on user queries and has partnered with brands like Nike, Madewell, and Nordstrom. Daydream charges partners a referral fee for purchases made through the platform.

articles.title: Genesys: AI Customer Service Revolution
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Genesys has launched Cloud AI Studio and AI Guides, empowering businesses to create AI-powered customer experiences. Graia has also launched a new Agentic AI platform and Amazon has revealed the introduction of new Agentic AI for warehouse robots, aiming to redefine customer service with empathy and improving efficiency for internal operations.

articles.title: Can't wait until Prime Day? This 'super efficient' cordless vacuum is already 72% off on Amazon (save $360!)
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: Amazon Canada is offering a discounted Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner for $140. The vacuum features ultra-powerful suction, a 55-minute runtime, an anti-tangle brush, HEPA filters, and an LED flex head for cleaning. Customer reviews praise its build quality and lightweight design.

articles.title: NTT DATA Announces New Industry-Ready Service for Salesforce's Agentforce
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NTT DATA introduced a new service offering for Salesforce's Agentforce to accelerate the adoption of autonomous AI agents. This service will be delivered via an 'EPAS' model and integrate with NTT DATA's existing data and cloud offerings, including Agentic AI Services for Hyperscaler AI Technologies.

articles.title: Transition Franchise Brands Selects Zuper to Elevate Field Service Efficiency and Deliver Seamless Customer Experiences
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Zuper launched its native HubSpot Integration and Transition Franchise Brands selected Zuper's field service management solutions to optimize operational workflows and customer engagement strategies. This integration enables efficient work order management, streamlined operations, and enhanced data-driven decision-making for Transition Franchise Brands' franchisees.

articles.title: Jess Cartner-Morley on fashion: travel trousers – the gateway drug to smart comfy dressing
articles.author: Jess Cartner-Morley
articles.summary: Lululemon's Daydrift High-Rise trousers are highlighted for comfort and versatility. Vuori's Villa trousers are mentioned as a similar alternative. Uniqlo is introducing a new style of Smart Wide Trousers available from the end of June.

articles.title: What Surprised Me About Ring's New Generative AI Camera Feature
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: Ring is introducing generative AI descriptions to its home security video services, available for all existing Ring doorbells and security cams. This AI technology analyzes video and creates descriptions of events, offering more detailed alerts to users. The feature is currently rolling out to Ring Premium subscribers in the United States and Canada.

articles.title: Man buys Rs 10.50 Cr Rolls-Royce Culllinan for one-year-old daughter: Details
articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.summary: Rolls-Royce launched the Cullinan Series II in India in September last year with a price tag of Rs 10.5 crore. The facelifted version of the luxury SUV features styling upgrades like slimmer LED headlamps, a redesigned grille, and a full-width glass panel housing the latest Spirit infotainment system. It is powered by a 6.75-litre twin-turbo V12 engine.

articles.title: The high-tech Dyson V15 Detect Absolute vacuum is on sale for $100 off
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the Dyson V15 Detect Absolute cordless vacuum at a discounted price of $649.99, a $100 reduction from its usual price. The Dyson V15 Detect Absolute includes features like a dust detect sensor, LCD screen, and Fluffy Optic™ cleaner head. The vacuum also has advanced filtration and receives high ratings on Dyson's website.

articles.title: Wunderkind Launches "Build": A Flexible, Developer-Ready Framework for Performance Marketing Integration
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Wunderkind released Build with Wunderkind, an API-first integration suite. Build provides brands direct access to Wunderkind's core capabilities like identity resolution and personalization intelligence.

articles.title: Sparkling Rum Brand Casalú Closes Seed Round to Expand Its Latino-focused RTD Across Key Retailers in Florida
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Casalú, a beverage startup, has launched a canned Sparkling Rum targeting Latino consumers. The initial flavors, Traditional "Limón" and "Maracuyá," are available at retailers like Total Wine, The Fresh Market, Winn-Dixie, Fresco & Más, and Milam's and are priced at $18.99.

articles.title: No internet no problem for AI droids with new Google tech
articles.author: Anthony Cuthbertson
articles.summary: DeepMind has launched Gemini Robotics On-Device, a new artificial intelligence model. This model enables AI robots to operate independently without an internet connection. The system allows robots to carry out everyday tasks and quickly learn new tasks from demonstrations.

articles.title: Samsung unveils 2025 Bespoke AI appliances range in India, price starts at Rs 36000
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 Bespoke AI appliances range in India, featuring AI-powered refrigerators, air conditioners, and washing machines. Key products include the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, Bespoke AI WindFree Air Conditioner, and Bespoke AI Double Door Refrigerator, all boasting smart automation, energy efficiency, and enhanced user interfaces. The new range is available across online and offline retail channels.

articles.title: New Phone with 6500 mAh Battery: Price & Specs
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Little F7 launched its new smartphone, engineered to deliver a premium experience. The new Smartphone is making waves with its impressive specifications and competitive pricing. Little F7 is challenging established brands in the smartphone market.

articles.title: Innovid Named One of the First Ad Tech Partners for Meta's Threads API Launch
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Innovid integrates Meta's Threads API into its Social Ads Manager. This integration enables marketers to activate the fast-growing Threads channel alongside other Meta properties within Innovid's platform. The integration provides ad support for Meta's Threads through Innovid’s Social Ads Manager.

articles.title: AI In E-Commerce: Are Brands And Customers Aligned?
articles.author: Rytis Lauris
articles.summary: Wayfair's Muse enables users to describe desired products and find design inspiration using AI. Amazon's Buy For Me feature allows users to discover products not sold on Amazon, purchasing them directly from off-site retailers using AI. These applications are aimed at improving product discovery and personalization.

articles.title: Noodles & Company Unveils Limited-Time Bulgogi Steak Mac & Cheese Ahead of National Mac & Cheese Day
articles.author: Noodles
articles.summary: Noodles & Company is launching Bulgogi Steak Mac & Cheese for a limited time beginning July 2. The new bowl combines the company's Creamy Mac & Cheese with steak and a Korean-style Bulgogi sauce. Noodles & Company will also offer a BOGO offer on July 14.

articles.title: MarTech+ #3: The Broken State of Customer Service
articles.author: Varun Markande
articles.summary: Meesho launched a multilingual, GenAI-powered voice bot resolving 95% of customer queries without human intervention. Eureka Forbes partnered with SquadStack and deployed AI-powered telecalling operations achieving a 30% uplift in Annual Maintenance Contract conversions. CaratLane also built its complaint-handling strategy which focuses on fast and full response, coupled with empathy. Lastly, Pepperfry handles complaints like mini projects by photographic documentation and create a visible ticket across the system.

articles.title: Croatian creatives launch world's first niche perfume for feet
articles.author: croatiaweek
articles.summary: Señor, a Croatian creative agency, launched Fussnota, which is the world's first niche perfume designed specifically for feet. This limited-edition fragrance, developed with Sortilège Olfactive Arts, aims to offer a playful and refreshing scent. The packaging emphasizes a multi-sensory experience.

articles.title: The 17 best car products our editors won't drive without
articles.author: Chelsea Collier
articles.summary: Several car products are highlighted including the Swigzy Extra-Wide Car Cup Holder Expander for oversized water bottles, Drop Stop Car Seat Gap Filler for preventing items from falling into the seat gap, Drive Auto Car Trunk Organizer for organizing trunk items, Hotor Car Trash Can for car garbage, WeatherTech Cargo Trunk Liner for trunk protection, Armor All Car Cleaning Wipes for interior cleaning, Smell House Paper Wrapped Anywhere Freshener for car scent, The Thrifty Handmade Daisy Vent Clip as a decorative air freshener, Cleanwaste The Original Wag Bag Toilet Kit for emergencies, Sinsen Car Safety Hammer Set for car safety, Rightline Gear Moki Ascent Car Door Step for roof access, AstroAI Portable Tire Inflator for tire pressure maintenance, Rhino USA Folding Survival Shovel With Pick for offroading, ESR Qi2 Car Mount Charger for phone mounting and charging, Saucemoto Dip Clip for sauce storage, Ogland Furry Steering Wheel Cover for steering wheel fashion, TeeTurtle The Original Reversible Penguin Plushmate for emotional support.

articles.title: 'Easy wearing' butter yellow summer dress from brand shoppers have 'fallen in love with' now 50% off
articles.author: Branwen Jones
articles.summary: Damson Madder is offering its Iris Mini Dress - Butter Broderie at a 50% discount, reducing the price from £80 to £40. The dress is described as 'easy wearing' and is made from 100% organic cotton, featuring embroidery, a pleated skirt, and side seam pockets.

articles.title: This new AI just might make online shopping fun again
articles.author: Elizabeth Segran
articles.summary: Julie Bornstein launched Daydream, an AI-powered chat-based shopping agent dedicated to fashion. Daydream uses AI to provide personalized shopping recommendations based on user taste and sizing from an inventory of 2 million products across 8,000 brands. The AI agent learns from user interactions to improve recommendations and tailor results.

articles.title: Poco F7 unveiled globally with Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chip, and more
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Poco has globally launched the Poco F7 smartphone. The Poco F7 features a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor, a 6.83-inch 120Hz OLED display, 12GB RAM, up to 512GB storage, a 6,500mAh battery with 90W fast charging, and a 50MP Sony IMX882 main camera. The Poco F7 12/256GB version is available for $399.

articles.title: L&F rolls out proprietary AI platform to accelerate digital innovation
articles.author: Ai포스트 Aipost
articles.summary: L&F Corp. has launched Lucid, a proprietary generative AI platform designed to enhance operational efficiency. This AI chatbot leverages the company's internal knowledge to automate tasks, allowing employees to focus on core decision-making. L&F plans to expand AI utilization into smart factory operations, aiming for an agentic AI platform to support autonomous workflows.

articles.title: What is Google AI Mode, how to use it, and its best features explained
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Google is introducing Google AI Mode. This introduction suggests the launch of a new feature or service related to artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Google's New AI Mode in Search Rolls Out in India: Here's How to Use It
articles.author: Kirti Chauhan
articles.summary: Google has launched its new AI Mode in Search for users in India. This feature, powered by Gemini 2.5, allows users to ask complex questions, get multiple answers in one search, and use text, voice, or photos to ask questions. It is now available to all users in India who use English on their device.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: 5 Major Upgrades That We Will Get To See This Year
articles.author: TN Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 at the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9, 2025. The device is expected to feature an ultra-thin design, a triple rear camera setup with a 200MP primary sensor, a 6.5-inch outer and 8.2-inch inner AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate, and a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor.

articles.title: Amazon Prime reveals new annual perk for millions of subscribers – but it will only last for 96
articles.author: Douglas Simpson
articles.summary: Amazon is launching an extended 96-hour Prime Day sale from July 8 to July 11, offering exclusive discounts to Prime members. New features include 'Today's Big Deals' and 'New Deal Drop,' providing curated deals and daily price drops on specific products. Prime members also get free next-day delivery.

articles.title: Alcatel V3 Ultra Review: For design-savvy and reader-first audience
articles.author: Haider Ali Khan
articles.summary: Alcatel has launched the V3 Ultra smartphone in India, targeting design-conscious and reader-focused consumers. The device features a matte Nxtpaper display, a stylus, and a clean user interface. The Alcatel V3 Ultra starts at ₹19,999.

articles.title: ElevenLabs expands access to AI voice tools with iOS and Android app: Features, availability and more
articles.summary: ElevenLabs launched its first mobile app for iOS and Android, providing access to its text-to-speech technology, including the Eleven v3 model. The app allows users to generate speech, export audio clips, and sync projects. It addresses the demand from content creators for a streamlined mobile experience.

articles.title: M&S is launching a new DESSERT sandwich and it's a dupe for a viral Japanese one
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: M&S has launched the Red Diamond Strawberry & Crème Sandwich, inspired by Japanese fruit sandwiches. Asda introduced Swizzels Squashies Drumstick Dessert Sauce, while Aldi released a pistachio cream chocolate bar dupe. Yorkshire Tea launched its first-ever iced tea drinks in lemon and peach & raspberry flavors.

articles.title: USU Unveils New Customer-Centric Brand Identity
articles.summary: USU GmbH has unveiled a new brand identity featuring a revised website, optimized navigation, and a focus on user experience. The rebranding emphasizes a customer-centric approach and highlights USU's commitment to delivering solution-oriented services. This reflects the company's intent to enhance its service offerings and improve customer engagement.

articles.title: New Look £36 dress in five colours is 'gorgeous' and 'skims over as it falls'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: New Look is selling the Light Blue V-Neck Floral Devoré Long Sleeve Midi Dress for £35.99. The dress features a decorative floral devoré construction, an empire line silhouette, semi-sheer sleeves, and comes in sizes 6-20 with five color options.

articles.title: HEINZ and Award-Winning Producer, Mustard, Drop the Sauce of the Summer: HEINZ MUSTAAAAAARD
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: HEINZ, in collaboration with Mustard, is launching HEINZ MUSTAAAAAARD, a limited-edition smoky and sweet chipotle honey mustard. Mustard, as the brand's Chief Mustard Officer, crafted the sauce. It will be exclusively available at Buffalo Wild Wings for two weeks before nationwide retail availability.

articles.title: 28 Matching Sets To Make Getting Dressed Easier
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: The article showcases various new matching clothing sets available from retailers like Amazon, Aerie, Princess Polly, Athleta, Free People, Lulus, Sabo Skirt, Nasty Gal, and Damson Madder. The sets range from linen sets to skirt/top combinations and vest/short sets, with pricing and sizing information provided for each product. The products are presented as fashionable and practical choices for various occasions.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils 2025 Bespoke AI Appliance Lineup in India with Smart Home Innovations
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 Bespoke AI appliance lineup in India, which includes the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, Bespoke AI Refrigerator with AI Vision Inside, Wind Free AI Air Conditioner, and Top Load AI Washer. These new appliances offer AI-powered features for personalized experiences, energy efficiency, and enhanced security, and are available across online and offline stores in India.

articles.title: I've finally found my ‘forever shaver' – and it's not much larger than a matchbox
articles.author: Marc Reeves
articles.summary: Yoose has launched the Mini Shaver, a compact, USB-C rechargeable shaver. The Yoose Mini Shaver features a double-ring curved mesh head, a motor that clocks 8000 rpm and IPX7 waterproof, is priced at around £59.99 and is available on Amazon.

articles.title: Fairphone 6 launches with new swappable accessories for modular design
articles.summary: Fairphone has launched the Fairphone (Gen 6) smartphone. The Fairphone 6 features swappable accessories for its modular design and introduces the Fairphone Moments mode for customized app and notification management.

articles.title: ElevenLabs launches the latest stand-alone voice-generation app
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: ElevenLabs, a voice AI company, has launched a stand-alone mobile app for iOS and Android that allows users to generate voice clips from text. The app features access to v3 alpha text-to-speech models and offers a free plan with up to 10 minutes of audio generation. ElevenLabs aims to compete with tools like Speechify and Captions.

articles.title: Seongsu may be trendy, but Yeouido is techy: Where to go if you're a gadget lover
articles.summary: Xiaomi opened its first offline store in Korea, located in Yeouido's IFC Mall, featuring over 200 products including the Xiaomi 15 smartphone. The store includes an after-sales service counter to improve customer perception. The opening is part of Xiaomi's strategy to enhance its brand image and reach a wider customer base.

articles.title: New Kidson, a fashion company specializing in e-commerce, announced on the 25th that it has complete..
articles.author: An Excellent Citizen
articles.summary: New Kidson plans to launch new infant products such as backflow prevention cushions, nap blankets, and baby belts next year. They also intend to start a new business for infant products. Furthermore, New Kidson is focused on transforming its New Kiki mall into a global platform.

articles.title: After 20 years, Sunrise Soap Company owner is retiring; longtime employee to take over
articles.author: Lena Tzivekis
articles.summary: Sunrise Soap Company's new owner, Sydney Stott, plans to expand the company's scent and product ranges. Stott aims to introduce new offerings while maintaining the company's established product line.

articles.title: Reserve Galaxy Z Fold 7: Pre-Order Guide (Even If You're Unsure)
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7, and they are offering early adopters exclusive benefits through the 'Galaxy Reserve' program. Participants can receive a guaranteed $50 credit, boosted Samsung Rewards points, and a chance to win $5,000. Reserving a spot allows individuals to stay informed and access deals related to the upcoming devices.

articles.title: South Jersey Scores Its First IKEA: Cherry Hill Plan & Order Point Is Now Open
articles.author: Shawn Michaels
articles.summary: IKEA has launched a new "plan & order point" store in Cherry Hill, New Jersey. In this new type of IKEA store, customers consult with associates to select furniture, which is then delivered to their home or office. Customers cannot take items home the same day but can arrange for delivery or pick-up.

articles.title: History Happenings: June 25, 2025
articles.summary: In 1877, Siddall's Magnetic Soap was introduced as a product that would simplify wash day. It promised to make clothes clean and white without boiling, while also protecting hands. The soap was sold for $1.50 at S. March's and P.A. Merrill.

articles.title: Top 4 Hand Creams for Dry and Rough Skin
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Plum introduces BodyLovin' Caramel Popcorn Hand Cream with a caramel popcorn scent. The Love Co offers Shades Of Love Hand Cream with shea butter. Teenilicious launches Hand Cream with Grapefruit Seed Oil & Matcha Green Tea, and LAURA MERCIER presents Neroli du Sud Souffle Hand Cream featuring a neroli floral fragrance.

articles.title: Poco F7 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Poco officially announced the Poco F7 on June 24, 2025. This 5G smartphone features a 6500 mAh battery with 90W wired and 22.5W reverse wired charging, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor, and a dual rear camera system with a 50MP main lens. It runs on Android 15 + HyperOS 2 and offers 12GB of RAM with 256GB or 512GB internal storage options.

articles.title: WPP expands partnership with Vercel
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: WPP has expanded its strategic partnership with Vercel to integrate Vercel's AI technologies, v0 and AI SDK. This collaboration introduces "vibe coding" to WPP teams globally, aiming to accelerate digital experience design and enable faster creation of personalized apps and websites. The initiative aims to increase development efficiency and grants WPP priority access to new Vercel product releases and joint investment into WPP Open.

articles.title: Your Galaxy phone will look inferior next month - date Samsung fans must know
articles.author: Dave Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung will host an Unpacked event on July 9 in New York to unveil the next generation of Galaxy devices. The event is expected to showcase reimagined phones, including foldable and flipable devices with improved designs, enhanced screens, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, potentially under a new 'Ultra' branding. The new devices will feature major AI updates, supported by breakthrough hardware.

articles.title: Half Price Print expands to UAE with over 700 custom products and sustainable solutions
articles.summary: Half Price Print UAE, a division of Half Price Packaging, has launched in the UAE, offering bespoke merchandise and promotional product printing. The company provides over 700 customized items with low minimum order quantities, catering to companies, SMEs, startups, and individuals. They also offer eco-friendly printing options and value-added services like free design support and urgent order fulfillment.

articles.title: WPP expands its partnership with Vercel
articles.summary: WPP and Vercel have expanded their partnership to include Vercel's AI technologies, v0 and AI SDK, aiming to improve development efficiency. WPP teams will use Vercel's AI-powered tools to generate code from natural language prompts, enabling rapid design, prototyping, testing, and deployment of marketing assets. This partnership also involves joint investment in new features and integrations for WPP Open, the company's AI-enabled marketing platform.

articles.title: Xiaomi unveils Poco F7 with 6,500 mAh battery
articles.summary: Xiaomi has unveiled the Poco F7 smartphone, the latest addition to its mid-tier Poco range. It features a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC and a 6.83-inch 120Hz Amoled display. The launch price is EUR 399.90 for the 12/256GB version and EUR 449.90 for the 12/512GB version.

articles.title: Galaxy Unpacked Mexico: Pre-Registration Now Open
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung will be holding a Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9 to introduce the next generation of Galaxy smartphones. The new Galaxy Z series are expected to be unveiled that will have thinner and lighter designs, advanced folding technology and enhanced durability. Pre-registration is open in Mexico, offering coupons up to $1,000 MXN for those who pre-order.

articles.title: Plum perfect: Beauty that speaks to the soul
articles.summary: Plum launched its 'We have Chemistry' campaign, spotlighting scientific formulations and emotional connections with consumers. The campaign reinforces Plum's philosophy of celebrating skincare rituals that foster deeper connections between the brand and its users.

articles.title: Google starts testing AI mode in search for Indian users
articles.author: Smarica Pant
articles.summary: Google has launched 'AI Mode in Search' as an experiment in Labs for select users in India. This feature offers users a unique experience by allowing them to ask longer, more complicated, or nuanced questions that previously required multiple searches, while leveraging multimodal search capabilities and real-time data.

articles.title: Suzuki Vitara electric, hybrid SUVs locked in for Australia
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Suzuki will solidify its presence with Fronx. Fronx will open doors to younger buyers looking to upgrade to an SUV.

articles.title: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 tipped to launch with Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 5,165mAh battery
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Xiaomi is preparing to launch its new foldable smartphone, the Mix Flip 2, later this week in China, officially launching on June 26. The Mix Flip 2 will feature a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, a 5,165mAh battery, upgraded design features, a 4.01-inch cover screen, a 6.86-inch inner display, 50W wireless charging and a Leica-branded dual rear camera system.

articles.title: WPP and Vercel expand partnership to enhance AI-driven digital experience development
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: WPP and Vercel have expanded their partnership, integrating Vercel's AI technologies, including v0 and AI SDK, into WPP's digital experience workflows. This collaboration aims to enhance development efficiency by using AI-powered tools and natural language prompts, enabling faster prototyping and deployment of digital elements. The use of these tools could increase development efficiency by up to 25% for React/Next.js projects.

articles.title: New beauty launch: No7 Good Intent Skincare from Boots
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: No7 launched the Good Intent skincare range on June 25. The range includes products like Glow Grind Cleansing Balm, Skin Sip Moisture Milk, and Overnight Glow Jelly Mask, designed to provide radiant, healthy-looking skin and a sensory skincare experience. The products feature innovative textures, appealing scents, and premium formulations.

articles.title: Tila Named Product of the Day on Product Hunt Following Launch of Its Generative AI Workspace
articles.author: New Media Wire
articles.summary: Tovie Mobile has launched Tila, a generative AI workspace, featuring a visual, infinite canvas powered by multi-agent AI technology. Designed for seamless creative workflows across various mediums, Tila allows users to orchestrate specialized agents that plan, reason, and transform content in real-time and is currently available in public beta.

articles.title: AI Impact Summit 2025: Watch Attendees Debate and Explore Demos on Day Two
articles.author: Newsweek
articles.summary: Doctronic's founders showcased their AI doctor at the AI Impact Summit. This AI doctor enables patients to have telehealth appointments. It provides quick access to primary and urgent care, aiming to fill the gap in immediate medical consultations.

articles.title: Next's new £48 suede sandals that have the 'prettiest detail'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next has launched new £48 Suede Bow Espadrilles Platform Wedges, available in navy and nude. These leather sandals feature a Forever Comfort footbed, leather uppers, lining, and socks, and are available in sizes three to nine, including half sizes and wide fits. The sandals have bow detailing and a woven platform with a 5.5cm heel height.

articles.title: 29 Somewhat Random Things To Buy For Your Home That'll Benefit You In The Long Run
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Amazon and Etsy are introducing or promoting a variety of new or popular products, including a smart plug controllable via Alexa, a versatile Always pan, sleek knife sets, fire-extinguishing aerosol spray, and a nylon-coated tape measure. The offerings extend to household items like cooling sheet sets, reusable towels from Hammer and Thread Handmade, LED lanterns, a Craftsman wet/dry vacuum, and self-cleaning litter box, air-purifier. Other products include a mechanical bidet toilet attachment, reusable sponges from Porter Lees, microfiber mop pads, a shoe rack, an Amazon Basics Dutch Oven, a Blink Mini 2 smart camera, a Stasher reusable food bag, stainless-steel mixing bowls, a first aid kit, a Boston Shaker set from A Bar Above, a garment steamer, box cutters, a digital scale, a pancake batter dispenser and mixer, vacuum storage bags, an accordion file folder/organizer and a toilet plunger.

articles.title: Best energy efficient washing machine picks for clean clothes and lower bills: Top 10 choices for sustainable laundry
articles.summary: The article highlights several new washing machine models from different brands such as Whirlpool, LG, Samsung, IFB, Haier, Bosch and Godrej. These models emphasize energy efficiency, advanced cleaning technologies like AI Direct Drive, EcoBubble, and Hygiene Steam, and smart features such as Wi-Fi control, catering to various household needs and preferences.

articles.title: Samsung offers $1,000 off preorder deal for new Galaxy foldable phones ahead of Unpacked
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: Samsung will launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 at its next Unpacked event. The company is offering a $1,000 discount for preorders of the new Galaxy foldable phones.

articles.title: Human-centric AI delivered at scale is the NiCE approach to CX
articles.author: Omer Minkara
articles.summary: NiCE has rebranded itself as a CX AI platform, emphasizing human-centered CX and business outcomes. The company focuses on realistic AI usage, measurable results, and practical applications in customer service and experience.

articles.title: Tinted Moisturizers with SPF: 14 Top Picks (2024)
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Neova Silc Sheer 2.0 Tinted Sunscreen is recommended, especially for mature skin. This tinted sunscreen is effective for sun protection, moisturizing, and nourishing the skin if used correctly, and it's designed to repair previous sun damage. It is recommended to look for SPF 30 or higher and nourishing ingredients, such as hyaluronic acid, squalane, niacinamide, ceramides, or glycerin.

articles.title: Be Your Own Fairy Godmother And Gift Yourself These 31 Useful, Lovely Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduced Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara for thin lashes utilizing lightweight tubing technology, while Our Place launched the Splendor Blender, a personal blender with a cup and lid. E.l.f. also released 'Squeeze Me' lip balm, a hyaluronic acid-infused lip balm in flavors like Vanilla Frosting.

articles.title: Fresh Story a new chapter for Sabah farmer's market access
articles.author: Juiceapac Web Development Team
articles.summary: The Fresh Story Sdn Bhd, a subsidiary of Farm Price Holdings Berhad, launched a new service on Saturday to improve the distribution of fresh produce and enhance market access for farmers in Sabah. The company will manage the collection, packaging, and delivery of produce directly to markets, aiming to create a stronger logistics network and increase farmers' income.

articles.title: 30 Helpful Things Pet Owners Swear By For Their Homes
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article introduces various new pet products, including stain and odor eliminators, dog staircases, pet hair removers, and food bowls designed to contain mess. Also featured are interactive snuffle mats, grooming tools, water fountains, and cleaning supplies, as well as solutions like litter boxes and protectors for cat owners.

articles.title: Samsung announces a new Galaxy Unpacked on July 9
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Samsung is scheduled to host its Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9, where it's expected to launch new folding phones like the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7, along with the potential reveal of the Galaxy Z Fold Ultra. The new devices will feature next-generation AI interfaces and revolutionary hardware, aiming to personalize user experiences through advancements in natural language processing and machine learning.

articles.title: WPP and Vercel Expand Partnership to Advance AI-Driven Digital Experience Craft
articles.author: Evelina Pak
articles.summary: WPP and Vercel have expanded their partnership to bring Vercel's AI technologies, v0 and AI SDK, to WPP teams. This collaboration introduces a method of using natural language prompts to assist with coding and accelerate digital experience design. WPP teams will also gain access to AI SDK, an open-source library that provides developers with tools to build AI-powered products and agents.

articles.title: URGENT: Texas State Faces MASSIVE Exit Fee Increase
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers a streaming service which can be accessed through its newly introduced 'WeAreIowa app'.

articles.title: 24 Products You'll Want If Your Kid Is Half Fish
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article features various newly introduced or suggested products for pool-related activities targeting kids. It presents a comprehensive selection of items ranging from inflatable pools and water toys to sun protection gear and swimming aids, all available for purchase on Amazon or Target. These products aim to enhance the pool experience for children while ensuring safety and fun.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked July 2025: Date, Time and What's Launching
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing for its Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9, 2025, where they are expected to launch new foldable phones, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7. These new devices, part of the Galaxy Z series, promise to be thinner, lighter, and more advanced, with potential features like a sharp AMOLED display and a 200-megapixel main camera. Early reservations are available with incentives like a $50 credit and potential savings of up to $1,150.

articles.title: Shop exclusive discounts with our everyday upgrades from shower steamers to totes, up to 60% off
articles.summary: No7 Beauty offers the Restore & Renew collection for firmer skin and the Lift & Luminate line for fine lines. VYBZ earbuds deliver high-quality sound with an LED battery display. Cozy Earth provides temperature-regulating viscose bamboo bedding to prevent night sweats.

articles.title: 35 Summer Must-Haves You'll Be Grateful You Bought
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The article highlights several new products designed for convenience and comfort. These include the Shark Flex Breeze portable fan with misting features, Adidas Cloudfoam sneakers, Monos Carry-on Pro luggage with dedicated compartments, and the Veer Cruiser City, all aimed at enhancing summer activities and travel experiences. Also Naturium cooling gel body wash infused with mandelic acid, a gentle AHA that helps neutralize body odor.

articles.title: Totalmobile launches Field First platform for next generation of field service excellence
articles.author: Pressat
articles.summary: Totalmobile launched Field First, a platform designed to address the needs of field service organizations. The platform represents a new approach to delivering field services.

articles.title: Google\u2019s new Gemini Robotics On-Device AI model runs directly on robots: Watch it in action
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Google claims that Gemini Robotics On-Device is new.

articles.title: Sunscreen Reinvented: Five new SPF essentials that deserve a spot in your 2025 skincare routine
articles.author: Srushti Kulkarni
articles.summary: In 2025, several companies have launched innovative sunscreens. Asaya introduced Air-Light Face & Body Sunscreen Spray, while Embryolisse launched Sun Stick SPF50+. Skin by Dr. G released SPF 50 Cool Mist. ClayCo launched Sakura & Rice Water Sunmist, and Rare Chemistry introduced Digital Screen Protection Gel to combat blue light exposure.

articles.title: What Surprised Me About Ring's New Generative AI Camera Feature
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Ring is releasing a new user-friendly security AI. This represents the introduction of a new product from Ring.

articles.title: Daydream Launches First Chat-Based Shopping Agent Built Exclusively for Fashion
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Daydream launched its public beta version of an AI-powered conversational search engine designed to provide personalized experiences within the fashion industry. The search engine transforms online fashion shopping by understanding personal taste and preference.

articles.title: The Unwritten Rules of Zelda: The Wind Waker on Nintendo Switch Online Explained
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: In June 2025, Nintendo launched Nintendo Switch 2. This launch included the debut of Nintendo GameCube games on Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack. The initial offerings featured F-Zero GX and Soulcalibur.

articles.title: PocketBook's InkPad Eo improves on the build quality of its forebears – it's a shame ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: PocketBook launched its first Android 11 e-note tablet. The tablet incorporates some features. However, the device needs improvement to compete with the InkPad Eo.

articles.title: Morpho and Gelato launch simple loans using crypto as collateral
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Morpho and Gelato introduced a new DeFi platform. This platform features an easy-to-use interface.

articles.title: Crypto, golf, and now phones—Trump cashes in on White House
articles.author: Nashville Pride
articles.summary: Donald Trump has launched a new venture called Trump Mobile. Trump Mobile was introduced on the 10th anniversary of his 2015 campaign announcement and promises a populist solution for hard-working Americans.

articles.title: Amazon announces expansion of Same-Day, Next-Day delivery
articles.author: WPXI
articles.summary: Amazon is expanding its same-day and next-day delivery services to over 4,000 smaller cities, towns, and rural communities. This allows more areas to access the benefits of online shopping.

articles.title: Paytm introduces Total Balance Check feature for UPI-linked bank accounts: Here\u2019s how to use it
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Paytm announced a new feature.

articles.title: Samsung 2025 Bespoke AI Appliances Launched in India: Price and Details
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Samsung launched its 2025 Bespoke AI smart appliances in India. The launch includes a new AI Laundry Combo with integrated washing and drying features and a WindFree model.

articles.title: Julie Bornstein's Daydream Is Leading The Agentic AI Fashion Shopping Revolution Starting With 8,000 Brands
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Daydream is redefining AI fashion shopping. It uses agentic AI, real-time personalization, and a discovery-first model. The service is powered by 8,000 brands.

articles.title: Google's new Gemini AI model means your future robot butler will still work even without Wi‑Fi
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Google has achieved an AI breakthrough that will allow future robots to function even without an internet connection. This implies a new generation of robot functionality or a service upgrade leveraging advancements in artificial intelligence.
